entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story. He is mentioned as laughing and shaking hands with Krum.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends. He is mentioned as receiving an invitation from Krum and having red ears.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends. She is mentioned as laughing, blushing, and reacting to Krum's presence.

entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: A dark-haired young man who is a latecomer to the group. He is mentioned as having a large nose, thick eyebrows, and an invitation.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Someone who invited Krum to the gathering. She is not described in detail but is mentioned as being responsible for Krum's presence.

relationships.description: Krum said that Fleur invited him, implying that Ron was also invited by Fleur.
Harry shook hands with Krum as a sign of friendship and welcome.
